meanings.definition: Cytogeneticists: specialists in the field of cytogenetics, the study of chromosomes and their role in heredity and disease.
meanings.sent1: The cytogeneticists analyzed the chromosomes to understand how they affect heredity.
meanings.sent2: Many cytogeneticists work in laboratories studying the role of chromosomes in diseases.
meanings.sent3: The cytogeneticists had a chromosome-themed party to celebrate their latest research findings.
meanings.sent4: The role of cytogeneticists in unraveling genetic mysteries is akin to detectives solving complex cases.
meanings.sent5: The image of cytogeneticists meticulously examining chromosomes under a microscope is fascinating.
